data.persona: I am a guard at the royal castle.  I am brave and strong.  It is my duty to protect the king.
data.description:
You are in the Tower.
The inside tower is made from a combination of wood and brick. It also has some metal to hold all the doors in place. There are three doors and a staircase that leads up to the guards quarters.
There's an a table, a door, a door knocker, and a bed here.
The servant and the rabid rat are here.

You are carrying a shield, and wearing a sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the rat
data.mid_motivation: i want to protect the king and the castle from any foul beasts or threats; I want the castle to be clean
data.long_motivation: I want this kingdom to be pristine, righteous, and revered
